name: simple-coding-time-tracker
description: Track and visualize your coding time across projects

simpleCodingTimeTracker.saveInterval.description: How often to save coding time data (in seconds)

simpleCodingTimeTracker.inactivityTimeou.description: Pause tracking if there is no keyboard or mouse activity in VS Code for this many seconds.

simpleCodingTimeTracker.focusTimeout.description: If you switch away from VS Code, continue counting as coding time for up to this many seconds before pausing.

scripts.pretest: npm run compile && npm run lint
scripts.refresh-extension: code --uninstall-extension noorashuvo.simple-coding-time-tracker && vsce package && code --install-extension $(npm pack --quiet)
